overview:
Sydney S. Budina is an Investor, Mentor, President and Chief Executive Officer of Global Business Chamber and President, Chief Executive Officer of International Business Chamber, Co-founder and Chief Executive Officer of TechColiseum, member of Board of Directors in different start up and tech companies.

He is responsible for managing an international business development, financial, operational, investor functions. He has been working with entrepreneurs, investors and early stage companies for over 15 years years in Europe and now in USA.

His goal is to bring start ups and investor from around the world to work together on projects on international level form the beginning.
